thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Heavy Construction Industry News
thread.title: Granite Construction misses Street 2Q forecasts

title: Granite Construction misses Street 2Q forecasts
text:
Granite Construction misses Street 2Q forecasts Granite Construction posts 2Q profit, results miss Street expectations 2 hours ago 
WATSONVILLE, Calif. (AP) _ Granite Construction Inc. (GVA) on Thursday reported second-quarter net income of $9.6 million. 
On a per-share basis, the Watsonville, California-based company said it had profit of 24 cents. 
The results fell short of Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 42 cents per share. 
The contractor and construction materials producer posted revenue of $569.2 million in the period, also falling short of Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $624.3 million. 
Granite Construction shares have decreased roughly 9 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has increased nearly 3 percent in the last 12 months.
